Interface AlleleConsequenceAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:

public interface AlleleConsequenceAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Adaptor for retrievning and computing AlleleConsequences.

Author:
Craig Melsopp

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(Transcript transcript,
                            java.util.List alleleFeatures)
                     throws AdaptorException
Creates the AlleleTranscriptConsequences that result from applying the AlleleFeature to the transcript. An AlleleFeature may cause zero, one or more consequences on the transcript depending on whether and where it hits the transcript.

Parameters:
transcript - transcript of interest.
alleleFeatures - zero or more AlleleFeatures to apply to the transcript.
Returns:
list of zero or more AlleleTranscriptConsequences representing the consequences of the alleles on the transcript.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(Transcript transcript)
                     throws AdaptorException
Return the AlleleConsequences for the transcript. A transcript may have zero or more AlleleConsequences. All AlleleFeatures that overlap the transcript or it's flanking regions (5000 bases up and downstream) are used.

Parameters:
transcript - transcript of interest.
Returns:
list of zero or more AlleleConsequences representing the consequences of relevant alleles on the transcript.
Throws:
AdaptorException
